284922619152739577.Text: The Dunmer regard Nords as dangerous savages with a thin veneer of civilization. The Dunmer say everything civilized about the Nords is borrowed from the Dunmer. Nord greed, violence, primitive religion, and sordid history are artifacts of their savage clan culture.

259911903031786107.Text: The Dunmer regard Nords as dangerous savages with a thin veneer of civilization. The Dunmer say everything civilized about the Nords is borrowed from the Dunmer. Nord greed, violence, primitive religion, and sordid history are artifacts of their savage clan culture.

3589291629115687.Text: Nords are dangerous savages dressed up as civilized people. Everything good about the Nords is borrowed from the Dunmer. Greed, violence, primitive religion, and treacherous history are all you can expect from Nords.

3136673471627224171.Text: The Dunmer see Nords as dangerous savages dressed up as civilized people. The Dunmer say everything good about the Nords is borrowed from the Dunmer. Greed, violence, primitive religion, and treacherous history are all you can expect from Nords.
